content_parts.title: Features
_jql: project = XT AND issuetype in (Epic, Story) AND 'X3 Release Note Status' in ('Communicated, Validated by PO/PM','Review Done') AND 'X3 Release Note Grouping' = 'Common' AND (statusCategory in (Done) OR status = 'Release Candidate') AND (resolution is EMPTY OR resolution = Done) AND (component is EMPTY OR component not in componentMatch('^Addon*')) AND 'X3 Epic Type' not in (Internal, Research) AND 'X3 Epic Type' = New AND fixVersion in x3ReleasesComponentsMatch("XT 2024 R4 (41.0.0)")

content_parts.content:
Save time with optimized duplication functionality. Enhancements include:

  • Entering or updating required values for duplication is simpler.
  • No limits on the number of lines you can duplicate.

content_parts.title: Improvements
_jql: project = XT AND ((issuetype in (Epic, Story) AND 'X3 Release Note Status' in ('Communicated, Validated by PO/PM','Review Done') AND 'X3 Release Note Grouping' = 'Common' AND (statusCategory in (Done) OR status = 'Release Candidate') AND (resolution is EMPTY OR resolution = Done) AND (component is EMPTY OR component not in componentMatch('^Addon*')) AND 'X3 Epic Type' not in (Internal, Research) AND 'X3 Epic Type' = Improvement) OR (issuetype = Bug AND 'X3 ReadMe Check' in ('To be communicated') AND 'X3 ReadMe Check' in ('Validated by PO') AND 'X3 Product Area' = 'Common' AND status in (Done) AND (component is EMPTY OR component not in componentMatch('^Addon*')) AND 'X3 Behaviour Change' = Yes)) AND fixVersion in x3ReleasesComponentsMatch("XT 2024 R4 (41.0.0)")

content_parts.title: Authorizations for manufacturing, stock, and finance

content_parts.content:
User rights management is enhanced and simplified to improve accuracy and reduce implementation and maintenance time.

The manufacturing, stock, and finance authorization processes include the following improvements:

  • Reviewed permission texts to ensure a better understanding
  • Grouping of permissions for a simplified setup
  • Automatic reference lookup management
  • Standard roles update
  • Display only the menu items that correspond to the user's rights

content_parts.title: Bug fixes
_jql: project = XT AND issuetype = Bug AND 'X3 ReadMe Check' in ('To be communicated') AND 'X3 ReadMe Check' in ('Validated by PO') AND 'X3 Product Area' = 'Common' AND status in (Done) AND (component is EMPTY OR component not in componentMatch('^Addon*')) AND (fixVersion in x3ReleasesComponentsMatch("XT 2024 R4 (41.0.0)") OR issueFunction in linkedIssuesOf("issueFunction in x3FindContentsOfImagefixes(\"XT 2024 R4 (41.0.0)\")", "is hotfix of"))

content_parts.title: Bulk delete not available for Customer, Supplier, and Routing pages

content_parts.content: You can use the bulk delete option on the Business entity, Customer, Supplier, and Routing pages.

content_parts.title: Supplier contact updates incorrectly change the Print As value in Sage Intacct on synchronization

content_parts.content:
Supplier updates do not change the "Print As" name in Sage Intacct after synchronization.
You can edit the "Print As" field in the Sage Intacct Business entity address mapping.

content_parts.title: Notification history: The link to a stock adjustment document does not work

content_parts.content: On the Notification history page, the link correctly navigates to the stock adjustment document.

content_parts.title: Purchase order planning: Group MRP suggestions to create purchase orders

content_parts.content: To improve stock reordering, supply order planning is introduced. Use the Purchase order planning page to group purchase suggestions together to reduce the number of purchase orders to generate from MRP suggestions.

content_parts.title: Bug fixes

content_parts.title: Filter for bill-by supplier does not display matching results

content_parts.content: You can filter by bill-by supplier on the Accounts receivable invoice page.

content_parts.title: Sales orders: Displays partially shipped when transaction is fully shipped

content_parts.content: The sales order status updates correctly when a sales order line or lines are deleted from the order after a shipment was partially created.

content_parts.title: Purchase order report amounts are missing commas

content_parts.content: The amounts in the purchase order report use the correct number format and display commas as needed.
The restriction on using expired stock was removed and you can select and issue this stock.

content_parts.title: Items page: Sales unit defined on the Customer tab cannot be used in a price list

content_parts.content: The Sales unit defined on the Customer tab for an item is available to use from the list of units on the Sales prices tab when adding a new sales price.

content_parts.title: Stock valuation: Calculation user displays incorrectly

content_parts.content: The calculation user on the Stock valuation page updates to the current user.

content_parts.title: Stock allocation: Shipping does not release allocations correctly

content_parts.content: All shipment allocations are transferred correctly.

content_parts.title: Purchase receipt lines with unsuccessful post to stock or tax calculation should not be available on purchase invoice

content_parts.content: When a purchase receipt in error is invoiced, the status does not change to invoiced until the error is resolved.

content_parts.title: Default dimensions on work order and purchase order from sales orders

content_parts.content:
For order-to-order processes, the work order released item, components, and operation resources inherit default dimensions from the sales order line. You can define specific rules for work orders created from a sales order.

On a work order released item, you can update the dimensions and attributes for the associated components and resources as needed.

For buy-to-order, the purchase order line inherits default dimensions from the sales order. You can define specific rules for purchase orders created from a sales order.

On the Attribute type page, you can activate the Employee attribute type to assign an employee to a transaction as a dimension manually, or as a default dimension for sales documents.

Default dimensions, including Employee, can be defined on the Customer page and you can define default dimension rules from the customer on sales documents.

If you integrate with Sage Intacct, a Smart Event synchronizes new, updated, or deleted employees.

content_parts.title: Bug fixes

content_parts.title: Missing tax solution ID on Sage Intacct integration causes error

content_parts.content: If there is no tax solution ID present when setting up Sage Intacct integration, an empty string is sent. This avoids an error in Sage DMO, and Sage Intacct controls if the tax solution ID is required or not.

content_parts.title: Features
_jql: project = XT AND issuetype in (Epic, Story) AND 'X3 Release Note Status' in ('Communicated, Validated by PO/PM','Review Done') AND 'X3 Release Note Grouping' = 'Forms & Reports' AND (statusCategory in (Done) OR status = 'Release Candidate') AND (resolution is EMPTY OR resolution = Done) AND (component is EMPTY OR component not in componentMatch('^Addon*')) AND 'X3 Epic Type' not in (Internal, Research) AND 'X3 Epic Type' = New AND fixVersion in x3ReleasesComponentsMatch("XT 2024 R4 (41.0.0)")

content_parts.content:
From the Report page, you can create a list report using a wizard that guides you through the process, which includes:

  • Selecting data and fields in a table
  • Defining filters and sorting
  • Grouping data and adding summary rows
  • Previewing your report

content_parts.title: Improvements
_jql: project = XT AND ((issuetype in (Epic, Story) AND 'X3 Release Note Status' in ('Communicated, Validated by PO/PM','Review Done') AND 'X3 Release Note Grouping' = 'Forms & Reports' AND (statusCategory in (Done) OR status = 'Release Candidate') AND (resolution is EMPTY OR resolution = Done) AND (component is EMPTY OR component not in componentMatch('^Addon*')) AND 'X3 Epic Type' not in (Internal, Research) AND 'X3 Epic Type' = Improvement)) AND fixVersion in x3ReleasesComponentsMatch("XT 2024 R4 (41.0.0)")

content_parts.content:
The report template designer just got easier to use and has new options:

  • Define page margins and orientation.
  • Zoom in or out when working in the design area to get a better view of your layout.
  • View header and footer sections in the design area so you can easily add text and variables.
  • Insert an unbreakable container so that all content in that container displays on the same page.
  • Use the Document properties panel to add dynamic fields like page numbers, current date, who generated the report, and so on.

The preview panel only displays the first few records. Select Generate to run the full report.

content_parts.title: Work in progress updates to inquiries and posting

content_parts.content:
Work order inquiry

When you run a work order inquiry, the Work in progress total above the grid reflects the total amount for all returned results based on the As of date. If you filter results in the grid, this value is not affected.

Stock posting

For average and FIFO costed released items, any variance calculated at work order close is recorded as Work order actual cost adjustment and Work order negative actual cost adjustment to the stock account.

You can search for these types on the Work order in progress transaction inquiry page.

Standard costed released items with any variance continue to be posted to the variance account as work in progress Work order variance and Work order negative variance.

content_parts.title: Stock valuation report does not reconcile for manufactured items at standard cost

content_parts.content: The stock valuation report reconciles with the financial postings for manufactured items valued at standard cost.

content_parts.title: Duplicating a BOM with more than 10 lines drops additional component lines

content_parts.content: A bill of material with more than 10 lines can be duplicated.

content_parts.title: MRP calculation justification results are limited to 5 weeks

content_parts.content: The Details grid and transaction graph in the MRP calculation justification results display according to the number of weeks included in the MRP calculation forecast.

content_parts.title: Date fields do not clear as expected

content_parts.content: Date filters clear as expected.
Duplicated fields were removed from the report template designer.

content_parts.title: HTML report template: Random characters display in PDF

content_parts.content: Symbols display correctly and random characters are no longer visible.

content_parts.title: Improvements

content_parts.content:
The Close button was renamed Close order to improve clarity on the Work order page. 

Additionally, the Post button was renamed Post stock in situations where no financial records are updated. This affects pages related to purchasing, sales, and stock.

content_parts.title: Search on Item description, Name, and ID unavailable for Stock issue lines

content_parts.content: You can search for an item from the Item description, Item name, and Item ID fields.
